Entries.default: "It's a shame we can't stop to savor places like this. But they remind me of what's at stake."
"I wouldn't mind spending more time here together. Once this is all over."
"This reminds me of a particularly lovely spot in the Cythwood. Perhaps I can show you one day."
"So many people. I much prefer quiet evenings together."
"When I told you I prefer quiet and seclusion, this is not what I had in mind."
"Do you think Berath would object if we just... stayed here a while?"
